lead_paragraph: Serena Williams knows how tough it is to reach tennis's Holy Grail by winning all four majors in a year and Novak Djokovic does too after his quest fell short on Saturday.
snippet: Serena Williams knows how tough it is to reach tennis's Holy Grail by winning all four majors in a year and Novak Djokovic does too after his quest fell short on Saturday....

headline.main: Laver's Record Safe as Djokovic Feels Weight of History
headline.print_headline: Laver's Record Safe as Djokovic Feels Weight of History
